NAME: Megarr
TITLE: Drunkard Giant
DESCRIPTION:
This giant has had a few hundred too many...

Starts with the Indomitable Status card.

NAME: Jhista
TITLE: Big Game Hunter
DESCRIPTION: A rustle in the underbrush; a crack in the air; a stroke of red painted in the underbrush.

NAME: Quo
TITLE: Deep Sea Specter
DESCRIPTION: When the roiling sea claims your flesh, the specters of the deep claim your soul.
